home.me: As a software engineering student, I specialize in creating modern and high-performance applications. My journey has allowed me to develop strong expertise in full-stack development, with a particular interest in emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence and cloud computing.

sopra_steria.description: Contributed to the development of the ARPEGE project (a national system automating sick leave and daily allowance management for the French Social Security) by implementing front-end and back-end features (AngularJS, Java, Python) in an agile environment.

capgemini.description: Contributed to the development of a Computerized Maintenance Management System (C#, SQL).

imt_mines_ales.description: Engineering program in computer science and networks through a work-study format, specializing in software development.

gtrsuite.description: Designed and developed front-end and back-end features for a Drive-To-Store marketing platform (Vue.js, Node.js, Nest.js) within an agile environment.

stmicroelectronics.description: Maintained Node.js libraries, proactively fixed bugs, and developed new full-stack features for internal tools (Vue.js, Express, MongoDB).

iut_grenoble.description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a specialization in application development.
